death.attack.ltxi.railgun_turret.unowned: %s was obliterated by a rogue Noctis turret
death.attack.ltxi.turret_rocket: %s was shot down by %s's Atmos turret
death.attack.ltxi.turret_rocket.unowned: %s was shot down by a rogue Atmos turret
death.attack.ltxi.unknown_weapon: %s was killed by an invalid LTX weapon
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.acid_grenade_core: Grenades contain a highly corrosive acid that reduces target armor strength.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.ammo_scavenger_en: Improves detection of high-grade LTX ammunition in the field.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.cryo_grenade_core: Grenades contain a cryogenic compound that freezes a large area.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.drill_diamond_lev: Diamond plating allows the drill to harvest diamond-level materials.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.drill_netherite_l: The composite alloy plating on the drill allows harvesting of netherite-level materials.
Special-issue drill cutter emitters are modified to work on any material type.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.electric_grenade_: Grenades create a burst of electrical energy. Recommended for use in humid/aquatic environments.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.flame_grenade_cor: Grenades are loaded with a concentrated fuel that creates powerful flames.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.fortune_enchantme: Calibrated to extract superior quantities of valuable resources.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.grenade_launcher_: Increases the velocity of the Hanabi grenades.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.heavy_pistol_god_: Rip through reality itself with this Nova upgrade. Ensures swift defeat of even the strongest enemies.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.high_impact_round: Light-frags with a punch! Send targets flying back regardless of their knockback resistances.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.looting_enchantme: Calibrated to maximize structural integrity of salvageable biomaterials.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.ltx_axe_default.d: Standard issue operating system. Cutter emitters have a low but functional chance to sever anatomical curiosities.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.ltx_shovel_defaul: Standard issue operating system. Excavator emitter preserves topographical integrity.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.ltx_wrench_defaul: Standard issue operating system. Designed to facilitate industrial logistics.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.neuro_grenade_cor: Grenades contain a powerful neuro-suppressant agent that highly reduces target attack strength.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.omni_grenade_core: Full spectrum adaptable core for the Hanabi. Allows the use of any of grenade shells.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.razor_enchantment: Weapon calibration enables the retrieval of anatomical curiosities.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.shotgun_default.d: Aurora's combat precepts, specialized in fast assault and scout operations.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.silk_touch_enchan: Calibrated to extract intact samples from the terrain.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.submachine_gun_de: Serenity's small light-frags zip right through targets without a trace.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.tool_direct_drops: Tool systems interface directly with your inventory, depositing materials without physical collection.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.tool_vibration_ca: Special lining on this tool's servos dampen vibrations from standard use.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.universal_energy_: Reroutes magazine feed to draw from Common Energy reserves. Say goodbye to your ammo stash.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.universal_infinit: Ignore the laws of physics with this never-ending ammo source. Try not to cause a mass extinction event, yeah?
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.universal_stealth: Targeting systems mask your signature, leaving no trace of your involvement. May not be effective against all targets.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.weapon_armor_pier: Volatile energy dispersal precepts. Allows weapons to partially breach armor.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.weapon_direct_dro: Weapon systems interface directly with your inventory, depositing loot without physical collection.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.weapon_shield_reg: Captures enemy energy upon elimination to power medical nano-tech and the bubble shield.
equipment_upgrade.ltxi.weapon_vibration_: Augments weapons and projectiles with an anti-resonance field, erasing vibration signatures
hint.ltxi.invalid_blueprint: The recipe in this blueprint is invalid or corrupted. Shift+Right Click to clear.
hint.ltxi.invalid_upgrade: The upgrade in this module is invalid or corrupted. Shift+Right Click to clear.
input_type.ltxi.energy.title: Energy IO Control
input_type.ltxi.fluids.title: Fluids IO Control
input_type.ltxi.items.title: Items IO Control
item.ltxi.empty_fabrication_blueprint.hi: Encode a Fabrication recipe in a Fabricator.
item.ltxi.explosives_weapon_energy.hint: Volatile burst energy suitable for use in explosive weaponry.
item.ltxi.explosives_weapon_tech_salvage: Broken components from an explosives handling device. Might be useful in reconstructing explosive weaponry.
item.ltxi.heavy_weapon_energy.hint: High-density energy capable of fueling the most power-intensive weapons.
item.ltxi.lightweight_weapon_energy.hint: Stabilized energy optimized for high-frequency, low-intensity weapon systems.
item.ltxi.specialist_weapon_energy.hint: Refined energy suitable for use in medium-power projectile synthesis.
item.ltxi.t1_circuit.hint: First tier circuit. Sufficient energy and data throughput for most entry-level applications.
item.ltxi.t2_circuit.hint: Second tier circuit. Improved energy and data efficiency from higher quality conductors.
item.ltxi.t3_circuit.hint: Third tier circuit. Highest performance on conventional materials. Handles all standard engineering and industrial applications.
item.ltxi.t4_circuit.hint: Fourth tier circuit. Exotic crystal-metal nanoarchitecture packed into a small form factor. Near unmatched power delivery and data processing.
item.ltxi.t5_circuit.hint: Fifth and final tier circuit. Can create digital microverses where its calculations don't break the laws of physics. Don't question it.
item.ltxi.targeting_tech_salvage.hint: Broken electronics from a targeting computer. Might be useful in reconstructing guidance systems for weaponry.
machine_upgrade.ltxi.eca_capacity.desc: Increases the energy capacity and transfer rate of the Energy Cell Array.
Elevate your Fabricator's manufacturing capabilities with superior internal components.
machine_upgrade.ltxi.standard_machine_sy: Core modular systems designed for balanced efficiency.
machine_upgrade.ltxi.turret_loot_collect: Loot is sent directly to the turret’s storage. If full, items appear at the turret’s base.
machine_upgrade.ltxi.turret_looting.desc: Smarter turret targeting systems allow for increased loot drops from eliminated targets.
machine_upgrade.ltxi.turret_razor.desc: Precise turret calibration enables the collection of anatomical curiosities.
machine_upgrade.ltxi.ultimate_machine_sy: The pinnacle of engineering precision! Achieves near-instantaneous crafting at the cost of immense energy consumption.
tooltip.ltxi.ammo_source.energy: Synthesizes ammo from Common Energy Units
tooltip.ltxi.energy_overcharge: Energy Overcharged! Your energy stored is more than your current capacity.
tooltip.ltxi.fabricator_selected: Left click to craft. Right click to encode blueprint (must have blank blueprint in slot).
tooltip.ltxi.upgrade_remove_hint: Shift + left click to remove upgrade. Must have space in your inventory.
upgrade_effect.ltxi.energy_ammo: Weapon reloads from an internal CE reserve
upgrade_effect.ltxi.infinite_ammo: Grants weapon infinite ammunition and magazine
